path.description: Path to add blocks to in your project.

includeIndexFile.description: When true creates an `index.ts` at the root of the category folder and exports all blocks from it.

includeTests.description: When true includes the test files for each block in the same directory.

imports.description: Controls the suffix when re-exporting from `index.ts`.

watermark.description: When true will add a watermark with the version and repository at the top of the installed files.
